content:
The beautiful scenes glimpsed through the car window while traveling between different world bubbles
are as unforgettable as childhood memories
of gazing at beloved dolls in shop windows.

I've always hoped my life
Could have a touch of poetic romance~

The crafting table is my absolute favorite thing, no doubt about it.
When materials meet inspiration,
That's life's wisdom taking shape~!

Looking at the sky, rivers, flowers, and all of you here,
I suddenly feel so content!
